caption.p: Relationship between larval survival rate of Phthorimaea operculella and plant chemicals. Linear regression of larval survival rate on carbon content (A), nitrogen content (B), C:N ratio (C), soluble protein (D), soluble sugar (E), cellulose (F), lignin (G), and total phenolics (H) with different host plants (□: Solanum tuberosum; ○: Nicotiana tabacum; △: Solanum lycopersicum; ▽: Solanum melongena; ◇: Physalis alkekengi; ◁: Datura stramonium; and ▷: Lycium barbarum).
